TopicTitle: Confusion about the new update system.

Articles.Content:
I believe that after the new transfer to git, update times were meant to be more frequent, less content-rich updates.

You have done significant work on flag placement, so why not release the flag placement as soon as it is done? It would add a small but fine touch to the game, and satisfy your playerbase.
That'll teach them for communicating with us!
And browbeating the developers ALWAYS works.

\

That'll teach them for communicating with us!

We've really quite been in the dark about this update.

This is in no means an attack to the developers.
Eh. I stopped playing KSP so I could make a new profile and mark were I landed on the moon. Sort of a lame excuse, but still, thats the reason.
